sname
BufferView
slabel
BufferView
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3

xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing
smany
true
seditCols
2
sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.BufferView/@rowHeight
sname
rowHeight
sdescription
<p>The height of a row in the grid.</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.BufferView/@borderHeight
sname
borderHeight
sdescription
<p>The combined height of border-top and border-bottom of a row.</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.BufferView/@scrollDelay
sname
scrollDelay
sdescription
<p>The number of milliseconds before rendering rows out of the visible viewing area. Defaults to 100. Rows will render immediately with a config of false.</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.BufferView/@cacheSize
sname
cacheSize
sdescription
<p>The number of rows to look forward and backwards from the currently viewable area.&nbsp; The cache applies only to rows that have been rendered already.</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.ux.grid.BufferView/@cleanDelay
sname
cleanDelay
sdescription
<p>The number of milliseconds to buffer cleaning of extra rows not in the cache.</p>
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute
